seniority_level.evidence: Minimum 3 years experience required, title is 'Data Engineer' without senior/staff designation, education requirement is bachelor's level

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence', responsibilities include ETL, reporting, and data integration

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects, reporting, visualization, and ETL tools like DataStage and Informatica - all batch-oriented

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring, or people management responsibilities - pure technical execution role

primary_cloud.evidence: Nice-to-have skills include AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure - no primary cloud specified

secondary_clouds.evidence: AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure are all mentioned as preferred experience

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects, reporting, and ETL tools - all batch processing oriented

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure Data Factory mentioned as preferred skill - cloud-native orchestration tool

storage_layer.evidence: BI/DW focus suggests data warehouse environment, Cognos reporting tool typically connects to warehouses

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Pune, Maharashtra, India with onsite work model

timezone_focus.evidence: Location restricted to India (Pune, Maharashtra) with onsite requirement

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model in Pune, Maharashtra, India - implies relocation required if not already there

h1b_friendly.evidence: Location in India with no mention of visa sponsorship - implies local hiring only

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Location in India with no mention of student visa support - implies work authorization required

citizenship_required.evidence: Location in India with onsite requirement - implies must be authorized to work in India

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position at IBM - standard W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in job posting or extraction results

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No explicit career path mentioned, only general 'continuous improvement' and 'innovation' language

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions working with business and technical team members, but no formal mentorship program

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions, advancement, or career progression paths

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or role changes

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks mentioned (IC, management, specialist, architect)

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must-haves (Cognos, UNIX, 3+ years) vs nice-to-haves (cloud platforms, ETL tools) - balanced requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on BI/DW reporting, visualization, and ETL - well-defined responsibilities

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 3 years experience requirement for mid-level role with reasonable skill set (Cognos, UNIX, ETL)
